work.title: Software Engineer
work.desc: Headed programming projects for team that maintains, develops, and integrates virtual machines and hardware for our customer. Developed GUI and backend for managing virtual machines and network/hardware (Python, C++). Led a full software conversion of virtual machine manager from CentOS 6 to 7, including reworking of backend.

work.title: Software Development Intern
work.desc: Worked on a team to develop and test software and build backend services (Java, SQL). Gained experience in team-oriented software development and business software development practices (Agile, Atlassian / Jira, Bitbucket).

work.title: ROTC Battalion Communications and Network Staff
work.desc: Acted as the Communication and Network head in the JMU Army ROTC Battalion. Handled network troubleshooting and solved communication and technical problems.

school.title: BS Computer Science
school.desc: Minor in Military Leadership. Participated in Army ROTC for 4 years.

school.title: High School
school.desc: Graduated with an advanced diploma. Participated in Computer Science program for 4 years.

hobbies: I am very interested in learning about all forms of development and or computer networking. Some of my personal projects have included personal servers, web apps, computer games, android apps, and also this website!
